<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="">[Animal Wrangler](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=135)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Extinction Curse Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=25) pg. 4

 

</column>

You have a long history of working with large circus animals for the Celestial Menagerie, such as performing in an animal act, jostling animals back into their cages, or even sweeping dung out of squalid pens. Mistress Dusklight’s ongoing mistreatment of her animals compelled you to quit, and you now strive to ensure animals aren’t abused.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength
or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in your choice of either the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)
 or the [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) skill, as well as a [Lore](/skills/lore) skill related to a particular kind of common animal (such as Equine Lore, Feline Lore, or Pachyderm Lore) You gain a skill feat: [Titan Wrestler](/Feats.aspx?ID=854) if you chose Athletics, or [Train Animal](/Feats.aspx?ID=856) if you chose Nature.
